flawed_nl_solution:
There are 16 chefs - 6 chefs = <<16-6=10>>10 chefs left.
There are 16 waiters - 3 waiters = <<16-3=31>>31 waiters left.
In total there are 10 chefs + 31 waiters = <<10+31=41>>41 chefs and waiters left.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13, not 31. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
